verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4003>fifteenth<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> of the <S%G2231>reign<s%> of <S%G5086>Tiberius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> being <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> being <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G2484>Ituraea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5139>Trachonitis,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3078>Lysanias<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G9>Abilene,<s%>

<S%G1909>in<s%> the high <S%G749>priesthood<s%> of <S%G452>Annas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas,<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the region <S%G4066>around<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G5613>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> "The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Make ready the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G4160>Make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G5327>valley<s%> will be <S%G4137>filled.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1015>hill<s%> will be brought <S%G5013>low.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G4646>crooked<s%> will <S%G2071>become<s%> <S%G2117>straight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5138>rough<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3006>smooth.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4992>salvation.<s%>'"

<S%G3004>He<s%> said <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> who went <S%G1607>out<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "You <S%G1081>offspring<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G5263>warned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come?<s%>

Bring <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3962>to<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> among <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2192><s%> 'We have <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> our <S%G3962>father;<s%>' <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to raise <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones!<s%>

<S%G1161>Even<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G513>axe<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2749>lies<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees.<s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G4160>bring<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is cut <S%G1581>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire.<s%>"
<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> must we <S%G4160>do?<s%>"

He <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats,<s%> let him <S%G3330>give<s%> to him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>none.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1033>food,<s%> let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>"

Tax <S%G5057>collectors<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> must we <S%G4160>do?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4238>"Collect<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that which is <S%G1299>appointed<s%> to <S%G5213>you.<s%>"

<S%G4754>Soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "What about <S%G5101>us?<s%> What <S%G4160>must<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4160>do?<s%>" <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "Extort <S%G1286>from<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> by <S%G3366>violence,<s%> neither <S%G4811>accuse<s%> anyone <S%G4811>wrongfully.<s%> Be <S%G714>content<s%> <S%G3800>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3800>wages.<s%>"

<S%G1161>As<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4328>expectation,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%> <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3379>whether<s%> perhaps <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5547>was<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2491><s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G537>them<s%> <S%G537>all,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> who <S%G3450>is<s%> mightier <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G846>I,<s%> the <S%G2438>latchet<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>sandals<s%> <S%G846>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>loosen.<s%> <S%G846>He<s%> will <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> in <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%>

<S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4425>fan<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he will thoroughly <S%G1245>cleanse<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> threshing <S%G257>floor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G596>barn;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he will <S%G2618>burn<s%> up the <S%G892>chaff<s%> with <S%G762>unquenchable<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>"
<S%G2532>Then<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G3870>exhortations<s%> <S%G2097>he<s%> preached good <S%G2087>news<s%> to the <S%G2992>people,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> being <S%G1651>reproved<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2266>Herodias,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>'s <S%G5376><s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4190>evil<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%>
<S%G4369>added<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> he shut <S%G2623>up<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> had been <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G4336>praying.<s%> The <S%G3772>sky<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> in a <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1491>form<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son.<s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself,<s%> when he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5616>teach,<s%> was about <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G2094>old,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G5613>(as<s%> <S%G2242>was<s%> <S%G3543>supposed<s%>) of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the son of <S%G2242>Heli,<s%>
the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> the son of <S%G2388>Jannai,<s%> the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%>
the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> the son of <S%G301>Amos,<s%> the son of <S%G3486>Nahum,<s%> the son of <S%G2069>Esli,<s%> the son of <S%G3477>Naggai,<s%>
the son of <S%G3092>Maath,<s%> the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> the son of <S%G4584>Semein,<s%> the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%>
the son of <S%G2490>Joanan,<s%> the son of <S%G4488>Rhesa,<s%> the son of <S%G2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the son of <S%G4528>Shealtiel,<s%> the son of <S%G3518>Neri,<s%>
the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> the son of <S%G78>Addi,<s%> the son of <S%G2973>Cosam,<s%> the son of <S%G1678>Elmodam,<s%> the son of <S%G2262>Er,<s%>
the son of <S%G2499>Jose,<s%> the son of <S%G1663>Eliezer,<s%> the son of <S%G2497>Jorim,<s%> the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%>
the son of <S%G4826>Simeon,<s%> the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> <S%G2501>the<s%> son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the son of <S%G2494>Jonan,<s%> the son of <S%G1662>Eliakim,<s%>
the son of <S%G3190>Melea,<s%> the son of <S%G3104>Menan,<s%> the son of <S%G3160>Mattatha,<s%> the son of <S%G3481>Nathan,<s%> the son of <S%G1138>David,<s%>
the son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> the son of <S%G5601>Obed,<s%> the son of <S%G1003>Boaz,<s%> the son of <S%G4533>Salmon,<s%> the son of <S%G3476>Nahshon,<s%>
the son of <S%G284>Amminadab,<s%> the son of <S%G689>Aram,<s%> the son of <S%G2074>Hezron,<s%> the son of <S%G5329>Perez,<s%> the son of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%>
the son of <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> the son of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> the son of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the son of <S%G2291>Terah,<s%> the son of <S%G3493>Nahor,<s%>
the son of <S%G4562>Serug,<s%> the son of <S%G4466>Reu,<s%> the son of <S%G5317>Peleg,<s%> the son of <S%G1443>Eber,<s%> the son of <S%G4527>Shelah,<s%>
the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%> the son of <S%G742>Arphaxad,<s%> the son of <S%G4590>Shem,<s%> the son of <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> the son of <S%G2984>Lamech,<s%>
the son of <S%G3103>Methuselah,<s%> the son of <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> the son of <S%G2391>Jared,<s%> the son of <S%G3121>Mahalaleel,<s%> the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%>
the son of <S%G1800>Enos,<s%> the son of <S%G4589>Seth,<s%> the son of <S%G76>Adam,<s%> the son of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
